import { Meta, Canvas, Story, ArgsTable } from '@storybook/addon-docs'
import { aetherStoryDocs } from 'aetherspace/schemas/utils'
import { isEmpty } from 'aetherspace/utils/commonUtils'
// -i- Auto generated with "yarn document-components"
// Components hooking into the storybook auto-documentation script
import { SignInScreen, getDocumentationProps as getSignInScreenProps } from '../../../../../features/user-management/screens/SignInScreen.tsx'
import { SignUpScreen, getDocumentationProps as getSignUpScreenProps } from '../../../../../features/user-management/screens/SignUpScreen.tsx'
// Mocks
import StoryContextProviders from '../../../../../features/app-core/mocks/StoryContextProviders'

<Meta title="features / user-management / screens" />

export const createDocs = (Component) => (args) => {
  return (
    <StoryContextProviders>
      <Component {...args} />
    </StoryContextProviders>
  )
}

## SignInScreen

export const SignInScreenDocs = createDocs(SignInScreen)
export const SignInScreenConfig = aetherStoryDocs({ SignInScreen }, getSignInScreenProps)

`/features/user-management/screens/SignInScreen.tsx`
```typescript
import { SignInScreen } from 'user-management/screens/SignInScreen'
```

    <Story
        name="SignInScreen"

        argTypes={SignInScreenConfig.argTypes}
        parameters={{
          backgrounds: {
            default: 'light',
            values: [
              { name: 'light', value: '#FFFFFF' },
              { name: 'dark', value: '#333333' },
            ],
          },
        }}
    >
      {SignInScreenDocs.bind({})}
    </Story>
</Canvas>

{!isEmpty(SignInScreenConfig.args) && <ArgsTable story="SignInScreen" />}
